citations.narrative:
A responsible person was not available to accompany the APHIS VMO on an inspection at 1:45 PM on Wednesday,
6/4/2014.
Each research facility shall, during business hours, have a resonsible person availalbe to allow APHIS official to
enter its place of business to conduct an inspection of all animals, facilities, and records.
To be corrected on all subsequent inspections.

narrative:
2.38(b)(1)
MISCELLANEOUS.
A responsible person was not available to accompany the APHIS VMO on an inspection at 1:45 PM on Wednesday,
6/4/2014.  
Each research facility shall, during business hours, have a resonsible person availalbe to allow APHIS official to
enter its place of business to conduct an inspection of all animals, facilities, and records.
To be corrected on all subsequent inspections.
